marklogic.body:
labour didn’t lose in bradford – they had a fantastic victory. what labour has lost is george galloway. george galloway is labour to the core. his victory is a victory for the labour party, for labour supporters, for labour members, for left-leaning, liberal minded people. labour’s lesson from this should be that the bliarite zombies that have taken over all three parties are not liked or wanted by the core supporters or members of any of their own parties. george galloway should be brought back into the labour fold. kick out out the bliarite zombie conmen from the labour, conservative and lib-dem parties. bring back the people that represent their own members – kick out the cuckoo toffs that have taken over.
so Cheer up miliband. this by-election has shown you that labour values are alive and well and Burning with passion in bradford. go there and harness what has happened or your nasty bliarite brother will snuff out the labour party along with your ambitions.
remember, galloway was kicked out of labour for telling exactly the truth about bliar and his war. bliar is the traitor to the nation not galloway.
